title: Ticket #3226: Corrupt log failure.
description:
Steps to repo: 
1. Submit a PU job let it run
2. rm the PU job
3. Submit second PU job
4. EXCEPT in Negotiator

ERROR "Error: corrupt log record 86 (byte offset 4080) occurred inside closed transaction, recovery failed" at line 1141 in file /home/tstclair/work/spaces/active/git/src/condor_utils/classad_log.cpp
remarks:
2012-Sep-11 13:01:56 by eje:
I think the spaces in the key name are actually the culprit - the classad log parser assumes the key is a single token with no whitespace: 

101 Resource.< slot4@tstclair.redhat , 192.168.122.1 > * *

it would expect something like this: 

101 Resource.<slot4@tstclair.redhat,192.168.122.1> * *

2012-Sep-25 16:50:33 by zmiller:
this was caused by the initial commit made for ticket #3221. that commit was reverted and a smaller change was made, rendering this ticket obsolete. resolving.
attachments:
• parse_fail_on_pu.tar.gz 33800 bytes added by tstclair on 2012-Sep-11 17:11:08 UTC.
    Full log account of failure. recheck line numbers.
